Professional Summary
Solution-oriented professional with substantial experience in innovation, business and product
development, project management, software development, go-to-market planning and execution,
and strategic management.
In-depth expertise working with customers to understand requirements, developing high-level
system architecture, defining user experience, managing development schedules, developing
go-to-market plans, and executing strategy.
History of providing leadership in business intelligence and information technology solutions,
marketing, finance, administration.
Articulate communicator with proficiency in Finnish and English. Basic skills in Swedish,
German and Spanish.
Core Competencies
Developing and managing digital transformation and accelerated innovation.
Full stack software development, lean methodology, architecting, machine learning and AI.
